entries.name: conflicts
entries.desc: @return [{String => Resolution::Conflict}] the conflicts that caused resolution to fail

entries.name: specification_provider
entries.desc: @return [SpecificationProvider] the specification provider used during resolution

entries.name: new(conflicts, specification_provider)
entries.desc: Initializes a new error with the given version conflicts. @param [{String => Resolution::Conflict}] conflicts see {#conflicts} @param [SpecificationProvider] #specification_provider see {#specification_provider}

entries.name: message_with_trees(opts = {})
entries.desc: @return [String] An error message that includes requirement trees,
